Yikes!

Sorry!

It’s seasickness!

Hey,

didn’t you say

we had to help

the first-

timers?

This boat,

as a Royal Navy survey ship,

is prepared to engage in a variety of tasks.

We will survey

the coast of

South America

and measure the longitude of

Rio de Janeiro

in Brazil,

and

we’ll also

explore the Falkland

Islands, which are in

a territorial dispute with Argentina.

55
